features.heading: Benefits, and why choose us?
features.description: Explore the benefits of using our product and why we are the best option for you!
features.secondGraphic: get started in just a few minutes
features.thirdGraphic: and stand out from the competition
features.fourthGraphic: by showcasing your profile in a unique and professional way.
features.seventhGraphic: we offer a wide range of options
features.eighthGraphic: to make your portal and business card truly
features.fifteenthGraphic: no one can see your personal contact unless
features.sixteenthGraphic: they tap one of your business cards.

comparison.text: The traditional way of sharing your information is by handing over a business card or writing your details on paper. But what if you could share your contact instantly and hassle-free, without resorting to paper?
comparison.firstUsual: Simple link in bio (not always available)
comparison.fourthUsual: Printed business cards can harm the environment
comparison.secondUpgrade: Create your own public personal page
comparison.thirdUpgrade: Add all the links you want to share
comparison.bottomText: Think of it as a LinkTree, but way better!

stepByStep.title: An explanation
stepByStep.subtitle: How does it work?
stepByStep.subheading: We combine top technologies to ensure our product delivers the quality you're looking for
stepByStep.stepOneTitle: Sign up and choose your username
stepByStep.stepOneDescription: You can sign up using an email or social media account
stepByStep.stepTwoDescription: Anything you want to share with your contacts.
stepByStep.stepThreeDescription: You can add your own content and personalize your page.
stepByStep.stepFourDescription: Choose from a variety of options or create your own design
stepByStep.stepFiveDescription: No need to install anything, just tap it on someone's phone and share your page, including your contact information!

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Clear and simple pricing, no hidden costs
pricing.subheading: We offer a single plan for all individual customers, so you can focus on what matters most.
pricing.planDescription: A single affordable and flexible plan, perfect for everyone. Includes:

faq.message: If none of these answers resolve your doubts, feel free to contact us at
faq.answerOne: NFC stands for Near Field Communication, a technology that allows two devices to communicate at close range, which also powers Apple Pay and Google Pay. ConCard uses it so you can share any contact information with others without needing them to install additional apps.
faq.questionTwo: How do I purchase a card?
faq.answerTwoPart3: and follow the onboarding steps, it's simple and straightforward, you can complete it in less than 10 minutes.
faq.answerThree: ConCard is compatible with all iOS devices and most Android devices (i.e., 2020 onwards). If the device isn't compatible or you have doubts, you can still share your contact information and links by scanning the QR code.
faq.answerFour: You can use ConCard to share your contact information with others without them needing to install additional apps. Just tap it on someone's phone and share your page, including your contact information!
faq.questionFive: What if someone finds my profile by accident?
faq.answerFive: Don't worry, we take your privacy very seriously and have designed a system to protect your private information. All pages are encrypted and are only accessible when you explicitly open them by tapping your card on someone's phone.
faq.questionSix: Where can I get my card shipped?
faq.answerSix: We offer FREE shipping to  Lima, for other cities the shipping is free for purchases over S/. 100 PEN. Finally, we also offer shipping to all Latin America, but the cost depends on the provider, for more information and pricing, please contact us!

contact.title: Contact information
contact.description: Fill in your public contact information

portal.title: Public portal
portal.description: Customize your public page or use a template

nfc-card.title: NFC card
nfc-card.description: Customize your physical card and get it ready

purchase.title: Purchase your card
purchase.description: Get it with your preferred payment method

finale.title: Finale
finale.description: All done! You're ready to roll

welcome.title: Welcome to ConCard!
welcome.message: We are excited to have you on board. Before we get started (and to make everything smoother), you just need to follow these simple steps to get your account set up.
welcome.helpOne: If there's anything you need help with, don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to help!

contact.howToContactTitle: How do you want to be contacted?
contact.howToContactDescription: Add some phone numbers and emails
contact.nameDescription: You can decide if you want to include only a name or both
contact.lastNameDescription: It is not necessary to include your last names if you prefer to do so
contact.optionalFields: Heads up, all fields are optional, but completing them will help you to give a better experience to your clients.
contact.title: Contact information
contact.autosaveDescription: Just wait a few moments and your changes will be automatically saved.
contact.subtitle: Fill in your public contact information, this is what every person you give your card to will see, additionally it is possible to hide it from your public page if needed.
contact.visibilityOptionTwo: If enabled your contact information will be visible when you share your portal through the NFC card

portal.title: Portal customization
portal.description: You can customize your public page to your liking here, templates are also available
portal.themesMessage: We're working hard to provide the best experiences with new features!, if you'd like to see it sooner please shoot us an email.
portal.profileFooter: A short title you want to show off
portal.bioDescription: Anything you want to tell people about yourself. This will be displayed on your profile page.(0/100 characters max.)

themeCustomization.title: Theme customization
themeCustomization.description: Choose colors, font styles and more!

cardPreferences.title: Customize your business card
cardPreferences.description: Improve your personal brand and make it stand out from the crowd.
cardPreferences.avatarDescription: Choose an avatar that you like!

headsUp.title: Heads up!
headsUp.description: By choosing this option you are able fully customize the appearance of your card, however it will be delivered AS IS, so make sure you add all the details you want to be visible on the card.

details.title: What should it show?
details.description: The contact info you added in the first step will be used to personalize the card as you see fit.
details.name: Your name

purchaseCard.title: Purchase your NFC card
purchaseCard.description: Your NFC card will be delivered as soon as possible and the way it was customized in the previous step.
purchaseCard.redirection: You will be redirected to our payment provider to securely complete the payment
purchaseCard.shippingStatus: {status, select, awaiting_purchase {Not purchased yet} in_progress {Shipping in progress} shipped {Shipped} failed {Failed} other {Unknown}}

finale.title: You're all done!
finale.descriptionPart1: Your purchase means a lot to us. Your support is heavily appreciated and will help us build a better product for our customers!.
finale.descriptionPart2: You will receive a confirmation email shortly. If nothing arrives try checking your spam folder or contact us directly, we're happy to help.

sharePortal.title: Your page is ready!
sharePortal.description: Share it with anyone but remember that based on the previous steps your contact information may be visible, so just be cautious!

warning.title: Warning! Portal inactive
warning.description: You need to purchase a card to activate and share your portal, you can do it by going one step back and purchasing a card!

pending.title: Onboarding incomplete!
pending.description: It is strongly recommended to complete the onboarding process, this way you can complete every step and get your portal active and linked to your business card.
pending.pickUp: Pick up where you left off!

continueModal.title: Continue onboarding?
continueModal.description: We've noticed you haven't finished the onboarding process. It is strongly recommended to complete the onboarding process, this way you can get the most out of ConCard.

emails.title: Digital signatures
emails.description: Use digital signatures in your mails

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here you can manage everything that shows up on your NFC portal page

card.title: Business Card
card.awaitingPurchase: We noticed you haven't purchased a card yet,
card.awaitingPurchasePart2: please purchase one to unlock all features!

modal.title: New social link
modal.description: Choose from our list of available social links
modal.message: A valid URL for the selected platform

editLinkModal.title: Edit this link
editLinkModal.description: Remember to click save when you're done.
editLinkModal.urlDescription: Any valid URL, if set to deployable, this will be where the button links inside the modal
editLinkModal.basicDescription: Simple button that redirects to a URL
editLinkModal.deployableDescription: A modal that can contain more information
editLinkModal.buttonLabelDescription: This will be shown on the button, below the description.
editLinkModal.descriptionText: This will be shown inside the modal, when the link is clicked.

visual.title: Customize your portal
visual.description: Choose colors, font styles and more, we'll add more options soon!

empty.title: No links added yet!
empty.description: If this is your first time here, you can add some links to your profile.

shareLink.title: Share link
shareLink.description: You can get a similar page like this through our app!
shareLink.getYoursDescription: You can have it up and running in less than 10 minutes!

common.requestAction: To request this feature earlier, just click here
common.requestFeatureDescription: We're always looking for ways to improve ConCard, if you have a feature request, please let us know!

contactLocked.title: Contact info locked
contactLocked.description: This person's contact info is hidden and will only be visible when reading their card directly or scanning the QR code
